*Wash Your Hands--Sanitization Stations will be available at Events
*Watch Your Distance--Social Distance Whenever Possible
*Wear Your Masks When You Can't Social Distance--When Waiting in Line, When Visiting Concessions, etc.
*Sit in Family Groups and Space Groups Apart
*Cheer Loud and Proud for the Chants!

Senior Students & Families:

Although it may be hard right now, let these moments set the stage for the GREATNESS that awaits you.

You are in my thoughts and on my heart daily. We miss you and we will be there for you.

~Dr. Nebesniak

post_text: The OHS English 12 class participated in a "speed dating" exercise for their thesis statements. Students had to make their case and back it up with textual evidence. In return, their partners would try to use textual evidence to prove them wrong. The students switched partners several times to give each of them the opportunity to revise throughout the process. The objective was to improve their ability to create strong thesis statements and use textual evidence in preparation for their literary analysis essays.
